In Acts one, so John had the privilege of hearing Jesus say in John 14 and then recording, let not your heart be troubled. This same Jesus, which has taken up from you into heaven shall so come in like manner. What a joy, what a joy. Listen, we need to recall this promise. We don't know when he's coming, but we know that he is. I said this last week, imminent and immediate are not the same thing.
